label: SupplyPlan
comment: Specification of the delivery quantities and date/time values in a supply schedule.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the commitment level for this supply chain supply plan, such as fabrication or raw material.
A date, time, date time, or other date time value of a synchronization of the supply chain supply plan.

objectProperties.comment: The actual quantity added or subtracted as a result of this delivery adjustment.
A period applicable to this cross-border regulatory procedure.
A confirmed delivery event in this supply chain supply plan.
A contract document referenced in this header trade agreement.
A delivery note document referenced by this supply chain supply plan.
A delivery event for this supply chain supply plan.
The minus tolerance quantity from the planned or requested quantity in this supply chain supply plan.
The planned quantity in this supply chain supply plan.
The plus tolerance quantity from the planned or requested quantity in this supply chain supply plan.
A scheduled delivery event in this supply chain supply plan.
A ship to party for this forecast delivery schedule.
A location specified for this logistics status.
A supply chain event specified for this product batch.
The value specifying the quantity for a synchronization of this supply chain supply plan.
The quantity of tolerance from the planned quantity in this supply chain supply plan.

referencedBy.comment: A supply plan, at line level, projected for this trade delivery.
The specification of the delivery quantities and delivery date/time values in a supply plan for this trade product.
